press_reference_link.label: Tandem PV Appoints Saritha Peruri as Vice President of Commercialization

news_insight_text_link.news_insight_description: Tandem PV has integrated perovskites with traditional silicon solar panels, enhancing power output. The company received a $4.7 million award from the U.S. Department of Energy. Additionally, a new Vice President of Commercialization was appointed.

org_similarity_summary.insight_similar_orgs: Tandem PV, Enphase Energy, Malta, King Energy, Apex Clean Energy, and Cleantech Solar operate in the renewable energy sector. Enphase Energy and King Energy focus on delivering solar energy to residential and commercial properties. Malta and Cleantech Solar specialize in energy storage and solar development, while Apex Clean Energy develops commercial-scale wind and solar facilities.

overview_description.description: Mechanically-stacked perovskite+silicon tandem solar panels provide a unique opportunity for solar to reach new heights

identifier.value: Saritha Peruri Vice President of Commercialization @ Tandem PV

properties.growth_insight_description: Tandem PV may be growing as indicated by the appointment of a new Vice President of Commercialization, which suggests an expansion of its leadership team to drive its commercial activities. Additionally, the company's technology is gaining recognition as evidenced by the NREL cell efficiency chart update, which now better presents tandem photovoltaics, the field in which Tandem PV operates. This recognition could imply an increased interest in the company's offerings and potentially lead to greater market penetration.

about_short_description.short_description: Tandem PV provides a unique opportunity for solar to reach new heights.

product.name: Tandem Perovskite Solar Panels
product.description: Solar panels that combine thin-film perovskite with conventional silicon to achieve higher efficiency and durability, targeting utility-scale projects.

product.name: Patented Perovskite-Layer Technology
product.description: A portfolio of patents covering core perovskite-layer technology, system, and durability performance, developed in collaboration with academic institutions.
